name: AnonFi
description: AnonFi empowers free speech, privacy, and decentralization by leveraging blockchain technology to create a dynamic SocialFi platform for users. HeyANON is a Decentralized Social platform with consensus moderation system, AI powered safety and tipping system for content creators and mods. Users will be able to use their nft as a profile picture, and use the web3auth wallet created on the registration to tip other users. AnonPad (launchpad directly on the social platform) is being developed, AnonSwap ( swap for crypto) is being developed, AnonMarket (marketplace directly on the platform) is being developed, AnonBet (a Decentralized gambling platform) is being developed.
